roleset.name: intoxicated (on alcohol)

example.name: with EXT
example.text: `` I 'm doing the main story , and I 'm already two beers drunk , '' said reporter Andy Furillo , whom the Times hired away several years ago but who returned to the Herald out of preference .
example.note: Here, 'two beers' is aimed more at telling you how drunk arg1 is, not what they drank

example.name: both args
example.text: You might be high on life, but I am drunk on Beer.

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on WSJ data, intoxicate-v.01, sober-v.01.
